name: npm
description: Installs one or more npm packages.

packages.description:
Supported formats:
  1) JSON array (string) of package objects, e.g. '[{"package":"typescript","global":true,"version":"latest"}]'
  2) Comma-separated list of package names, e.g. 'npm,yarn,typescript'
  3) Comma-separated list of npm-style args per item, e.g. '-g npm@latest, -g yarn@latest, typescript@5' (each item is passed to 'npm install')
